subject: Power supply for VAM PRO
description_text:
Hey,

I got a VAM PRO as a Christmas present, but it didn’t include the power
supply. I was wondering if I have to buy the official one from you, or if I
can use something I already have or purchase a third-party supply with
similar power specs.

If so, what are the exact power specs for the power supply?

The problem is that the tax and shipping end up costing more than your
power supply itself.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Kruse,  You may use an alternative 24V external power supply, as long as the power plug is compatible with a 2.5 mm DC jack and the output rating is 24V / 3A.
